name: filerun
description: FileRun is a self-hosted file management solution with rich features like metadata, previewing, access controls, and mobile apps. It serves as a private file cloud alternative to Dropbox and is available on SaaS as well.
features: File Cloud: Self-hosted file management, Rich metadata support, File previewing. Private Dropbox alternative.
Access Controls: Granular permissions. Secure sharing.
Mobile Apps: Access from anywhere. Full mobile support.
Feature-Rich: Advanced file organization. Professional-grade solution.
Photo Gallery: Organize and view images. Beautiful presentation.
Document Editing: Edit files online. Collaborative work.
WebDAV: Standard protocol support. Universal access.
Search: Find files by content and metadata. Powerful discovery.
Versioning: Track file changes. Restore previous versions.
